column1: PR AI Impact Analysis Report - Team Overall
This report analyzes PR data across multiple periods to evaluate
the impact of AI tools on development efficiency:
Daily Throughput (average per capacity, excl. leave)
Avg Time to Merge per PR (days)
Avg Time to First Review per PR (hours)
Note: N/A values indicate insufficient data for that metric in the period.
• Avg Time to Merge per PR: 1.72d → 5.72d (+232.6% change)
• Avg Lines Deleted per PR: 17.50 → 36.60 (+109.1% change)
• Avg Files Changed per PR: 5.50 → 5.80 (+5.5% change)
• Avg Time to First Review per PR: 6.07h → 0.09h (-98.6% change)
• Avg Lines Added per PR: 138.00 → 75.80 (-45.1% change)
